faqs.question: What are the current supported Blender versions?
faqs.answer:
### Latest Supported Versions

|Version|Policy|End Of Life Date/Notes|
|--|--|--|
|4.2 LTS|We currently fully support Blender 4.2 LTS, the current 4.2 dev branch may contain further fixes and updates. All blender 4.2 releases will be released under version number 4.2.x.x.|Currently set for 3 months after the first stable Avatar Toolkit comes out, this most likely won't be unto Blender 5.0|
|4.3|Currently in Early Alpha for 4.3, the current 4.3 dev is the Alpha. All blender 4.3 releases will be released under version number 4.3.x.x.|Currently set for 1 months after the first stable Avatar Toolkit comes out, this most likely won't be unto Blender 5.0|

### Approaching End Of Life

|Version|Policy|End Of Life Date|Notes|
|--|--|--|--|
|3.6 LTS|We currently Fully Support Blender 3.6 LTS and it will be given priority unto the next LTS version come out. All 3.6 versions number will be under 3.6.x.x.|30/11/2024|Blender 3.6 Cats is approaching EOL, this means after the 30/11/2024 no further updates will be provided|
|4.1|We currently Fully Support Blender 4.1. All 4.1 versions number will be under 4.1.x.x.|30/11/2024|Blender 4.1 Cats is approaching EOL, this means no updates will be provided after 30/11/2024|

faqs.question: What happens when a new LTS version is released?
faqs.answer:
When a new LTS comes out, we will make that LTS our main version, all older LTS's will be given a finale date of when we will support it too. For example if Blender 4.2 LTS comes out in June, we will give the 3.6 LTS about 6 month more support and updates so 3.6 would be supported unto November.

[note]Please note dates and how long we support a LTS is not finale.[/note]

faqs.question: What are the legacy/unsupported Blender versions?
faqs.answer:
[warning]Do not report issues for these versions as they are no longer supported.[/warning]

|Version|Policy|
|--|--|
|4.0|No longer supported, the last version to support this version of blender was [link]https://github.com/Yusarina/Cats-Blender-Plugin-Unofficial-/releases/tag/4.0.5.2|4.0.5.2[/link]|
|3.3, 3.4 and 3.5|No longer supported, the last version to support these versions of blender is [link]https://github.com/Yusarina/Cats-Blender-Plugin-Unofficial-/releases/tag/0.40.0|0.40.0[/link]|
|3.2 and below|No longer supported, the last version to support these versions is [link]https://github.com/Yusarina/Cats-Blender-Plugin-Unofficial-/releases/tag/0.30.0|0.30.0[/link] however this may have issues on 2.8, please use the official version of cats for 2.8.|
|2.79|Even the official cats has not worked on this version of Blender properly for a long time, we do not support this version, please use an older version of the official cats for this version of blender.|
